Text: Xvid version! Awesome, saves me converting it. Thanks again.
@greebomc What software are you using? If you use VLC or WMP-HC, it'll play XviD or x264.
@TlanImas I usually don't watch through my computer, have a huge old TV with no HDMI connections but a DVD hooked up which has a USB reader and will play MPEG or Xvid.
